title: Private Entrance, Late Fee Forgiveness, Laundry Facility
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Private Entrance', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Laundry Facility', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Additional Storage', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
